title: Modern type with curly "R"
content:
Hello everyone,

I'm working on a design for my wedding and I'm looking for this font. Sorry I only have uppercase.  
The K & R should help to identify as they look a bit special.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172334im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontid_4427.png)

Thanks !

Font: 

 Pluto
